title: Sore Ike! Anpanman: Baikinman to Suteki na Christmas Cake

alternative_titles.ja: それいけ! アンパンマン ばいきんまんとすてきなクリスマスケーキ

synopsis:
Dokin-chan gets into a fight with Baikinman on Christmas Eve. Then Kokin-chan comes to invite Dokin-chan to a Christmas cake class. Meanwhile, Baikinman sulks and leaves, but heads to the venue where the cake class is being held to wreak havoc in the city... Will Anpanman be able to stop Baikinman's rampage? Will Baikinman and Dokin-chan be able to make up and have a fun Christmas Eve?

(Source: Amazon, translated)
